meanings.definition: A person who works on a farm.
meanings.sent1: The farmworker harvested the ripe vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The farmworker planted seeds in the field.
meanings.sent3: The farmworker accidentally wore overalls to a fancy dinner.
meanings.sent4: The farmworker's dedication to the land was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The farmworker's hands bore the marks of hard labor.

meanings.definition: One who is employed to work on a farm.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the farmworker milked the cows.
meanings.sent2: The farmworker repaired the broken fence on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The farmworker tried to teach the chickens to dance.
meanings.sent4: The farmworker was the backbone of the agricultural community.
meanings.sent5: The farmworker's presence brought life to the vast fields.
